A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Excitement falls flat\, throws legendary characters to the wind instead of holding the legacy. Jokes are great but not in every scene. Decides to ignore most of the set up from Force awakens. Literally the movie would have been over in the beginning if Vice Admiral Holdo just told her people her plan\, and di would have never had the chance to rat out the rebels and everyone would have made it to safety
